## Description {#details}

Information about how a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object was allocated, to be passed into the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> constructor.

DO NOT USE DIRECTLY. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> one of the <code>AllocMarker</code> structs instead, they call all be implicitly converted to <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/user/allocinfo">AllocInfo</a></code>.

Definition at line 79 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/user-h">User.h</a>.
